item.description:
We are at 75 members and growing, and we hope to channel that momentum into better and better Meetups.

This month's Meetup will focus on implementation issues with CiviMail. We are looking for people and organizations far and wide, big and small, who have used CiviMail successfully, conquering various hurdles of all different stripes.

Please let us know if you might be able to speak briefly about your experience using CiviMail, and help us reach the local organizations you know that use it.

Thanks to the American Friends Service Committee for hosting us!
item.how_to_find_us: Go down the hallway and there's a conference room on the right side.
item.name: May Meetup - Boston CiviCRM
